item.title: Expense Tracker
item.description: Project Requirements A minimalist Expense Tracker App. Project Description A multi-user MERN full-stack App designed to track expenses, uses Firebase Authentication.

item.title: Restaurant Ordering App
item.description: Project Description I built this full-stack app with React and a mix of different technologies, to experiment with Stripe Payments API in REST routing system.
